'''Mastodon''' is a free, open-source social network server. A decentralized solution to commercial platforms, it avoids the risks of a single company monopolizing your communication. Anyone can run Mastodon and participate in the social network seamlessly.<br>
An alternative implementation of the [[GNU Social]] project.<br>
<br>
For more details, see: [https://github.com/tootsuite/mastodon Mastodon project on Github]
